item.name: Agent ping
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

item.name: Average disk read queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length

item.name: Average disk write queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

trigger.name: Host name of zabbix_agentd was changed on {HOST.NAME}
ICMP ping response too slow from {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Host reponses to ICMP ping but too slowly. Might be CPU load on host or network traffic causing this.

trigger.name: Lack of free memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Lack of free swap space on {HOST.NAME}
No ICMP ping response from {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Host do not reponse to ICMP ping.

trigger.name: No ICMP ping response from {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Host do not reponse to ICMP ping.

trigger.name: Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Version of zabbix_agent(d) was changed on {HOST.NAME}
Zabbix agent on {HOST.NAME} is unreachable for 180 minutes
